hadiths.english_translation: When the call to prayer is made, Satan flees with breaking wind until he cannot hear the call to prayer. When the call is finished, he returns. Then when the iqamah is made, he flees, and when it is finished, he returns. Then he comes between the man and his soul, saying: Remember this, remember that of what he was not remembering before, until the man does not know how much he has prayed.

hadiths.english_translation: When the strap of one of your sandals breaks, do not walk with one shod foot and the other bare foot. Either walk barefoot on both or wear sandals on both feet. And verily, a vow does not bring to the son of Adam anything that I had not already decreed for him, but it is the vow that finds what I have decreed for him which I use to extract from the stingy, and he gives to me what he would not have given to me before. And the vow brings to him what I did not give him before. And Allah said: Spend, and I will spend on you. And he called war deception.
